title: South Africa Sets Licensing Deadline for Digital Asset Exchanges
description:
South Africa’s financial regulator, the Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA), announced that crypto exchanges in the country must obtain licenses to operate by the year-end, reports Bloomberg. The financial regulator intends to take “enforcement action” against crypto exchanges operating without a license after the deadline, which may lead to closure or fines, according to the […]

The post South Africa Sets Licensing Deadline for Digital Asset Exchanges appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: ‘Overwhelming’ 92% of People Demonstrate Awareness of Crypto, According to New Consensys Study
description:
